short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Guarding you against Rug Pulls & Honeypots across BSC & ETH Chains

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Guard Dog is a must-have app for anyone who wants to invest in cryptocurrencies on the Binance Smart Chain or Ethereum blockchain. Developed by Shibanftai, this app provides you with an extra layer of protection by checking tokens for potential scams before you invest your hard-earned money.

With Guard Dog, you can easily search for any token on the Binance Smart Chain or Ethereum blockchain to see if it is a scam or not. The app uses advanced algorithms to analyze the token's smart contract and provide you with a risk assessment score.
